hieros

In the Egyptian cosmos and geography,
duality 𓈋𓈇𓅒
Trinity 𓈉𓇾
4-ness 𓊖𓊽
All-ness 𓎟 were important.

also see numbers

0.) Null 𓏌 nill none mono primodial mound ‘mundo’ 𓏌𓏌𓏌𓇯𓈗 Nun𓀭 Amun?
1.) Erst Air 𓄿 𓇯 𓉔𓄿𓏏𓇯 haute photair first
2.) Dual 𓈋 *dval valley Tal tell(hill) 𓈋 devil dvelling 𓈇taui II lands
3.) Trinity 𓈉𓇾 Terra terrain territory
4.) Four quarters 𓊖 KurOrt Center Court 𓊖 4 corners of cities and the earth

Some hieroglyps/concepts look a bit like puzzle pieces for children:
𓇯 air, the word for air is simply written as Air 𓄿
𓎟 all, the word for all is related to 𓎡 kalla=all@Hebrew Kelle=jug@german
𓈋 dval, dual for tell(hill) and Tal(valley) vs 𓏏 tell Delle
𓇾 ter, terrain: earth

As in PIE religions, we have a duality between a potent father sky 𓊪𓏏𓇯 and mother earth 𓅐𓏏𓁐, although both often have have partners (dom,dame) or even switch roles 𓏌𓏏𓇯𓁐 Nut vs Mut 𓅐𓏏𓁐! Nun & Naunet.
